entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #61765
  • Respect JsonSerializerOptions casing for property names in validation errors #61764
  • Unused TRoleClaim in Microsoft.Extensions.Identity.Stores.UserStore class #61763
  • DynamicComponent renders outside of surrounding HTML tags after prerendering + hydration (render article from database and parsing markers) #61760
  • Blazor WASM (Old-style project) stuck on mono_wasm_runtime_ready #61759
  • Perf regression: tls-renegotiation-kestrel #61758
  • [Routing] EndpointGroupName can't be inherited #61757
  • BLAZOR - @bind-Value:after stopped working after update2 #61756

Closed

  • Metrics for improved memory pool diagnosability #59442
    .NET 10 Planning
  • API Proposal: Expose TLS client hello message #60805
    10.0-preview4
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #61752
  • Add Timer To Login Page In Blazor #61475
  • Silent crash occurs when using an <InputFile> for the Vivaldi browser. #61585
  • EditForm in Blazor while post the data #61583
  • WASH and java script a hit or miss if that web page runs #61601
  • Bug at the time of running the program after publication #61599
  • Blazor cann't refresh page. #61604
  • onchange only fired when a breakpoint is set in code-behind #61603
  • Can not deploy blazor wasm as usual #61606
  • .NET 7 - Blazor server app running in VS2022, IIS Express, rapidly consumes all available memory #61605
  • In Blazor/Wasm VS2022(17.12.1) Memory Leak in Processing program between switching pages #61607

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix handling of nullable types in validations generator #61766
    area-minimal, feature-validation
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `52204f7` to `04ee1b4` #61762
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `52204f7` to `04ee1b4` #61761
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x

Merged

  • feat: support tls client hello bytes callback in Kestrel #61631
    area-networking, 10.0-preview5

Updated

  • Blazor - rendering metrics and tracing #61609
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview5
  • Swap out Win11 for Win-VS2022 in CI #61743
    area-infrastructure
  • Associate tagged keys with entries so replacements are not evicted #61529
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 10.0-preview5
  • [release/9.0] Forwarded Headers Middleware: Ignore XForwardedHeaders from Unknown Proxy #61622
    Servicing-approved, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Forwarded Headers Middleware: Ignore XForwardedHeaders from Unknown Proxy #61623
    Servicing-approved, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware, 8.0.x
  • [release/2.3] Forwarded Headers Middleware: Ignore XForwardedHeaders from Unknown Proxy #61642
    Servicing-approved, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Retry test ResponseCaching.Tests.CachedResponseBodyTests.Copy_SingleSegment #61671
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #61745
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [Blazor] Remove the check for `cacheBootResources` from Auto render mode detection #61666
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview5
  • Fix HttpLoggingMiddleware Request/Response bodies logging in case of stream being closed by a subsequent middleware #61490
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Temporal Table Generates With Identity Column #36025
  • SQL Server: bring JSON type out of experimental status #36024
    10.0.0
  • Upgrading efcore provider to efcore 8 results in UnexpectedTrailingResultSetWhenSaving #36023
  • Msg 1035, Level 15, State 10, Line 303 Incorrect syntax near 'CAST', expected 'AS'. Msg 102, Level 15, State 1, Line 311 Incorrect syntax near 'c'. #36021
  • TPH inheritance with owned JSON type causes NullReferenceException when replacing derived entity with same key #36019

Closed

  • [RevEng] SQL Server Json datatype not supported? #35943
  • DATEDIFF unexpected results #36022
  • EF studio #36017

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #36018

Merged

  • Use SqlClient 6.1.0-preview1.25120.4 #36020

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • https://github.com/dotnet/maui/discussions/29221 #29284
  • Html encoded less than character "<" does not display in a Label when followed by a character immediately after #29282
  • Shell SearchHandler.Unfocus() has no effect on iOS & Android #29277
    Backlog
  • Binding the `Title` of a `ShellContent` with a `StringFormat` causes the string format to be applied multiple times. #29275
    Backlog

Closed

  • Scroll jitter #19383
    Backlog
  • I8_Header_and_Footer - Missing footer after clicking 'Clear All Items' button. #29137
    .NET 9 SR7
  • SwipeView In a CollectionView Faults When Scrolled in .NET 8 RC 2 #18530
    Backlog
  • MAUI: default mail app in IOS is not open... #29262
  • [regression/7.0.92] DatePicker Initial Binding/Rendering Not Working #16664

PullRequests

Created

  • Setup Stage for Validating CarouselView2 #29283
  • Remove Compatibility.Layout as a subclass of all modern .NET MAUI controls #29281
    t/breaking 💥, area-layout, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • [Shell] Changed TitleProperty From TwoWay to OneWay #29280
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [.Net 10] Shell.SetNavBarVisibilityAnimationEnabled property #29279
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android & iOS]Make SearchHandler's Focus() and Unfocus() work #29278
    community ✨
  • [NET10.0] Annotate converters for nullability 2/n #29276
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView Scrolling Feature #29230
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Re-Enabled UI Test - Issue10222Test #29226
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixes footer position not updated on CV1 when clearing all items #29173
    p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Fix for Argument Exception raised when the GetStringSize method of ICanvas called with default font #29048
    platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [ci] Update internal release pipeline to push nuget #29271

Updated

  • Fix SafeArea management on iOS #28283
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • [2025/05/03] Staging - In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [net10.0] Update preview4 dotnet #29254
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Windows] Remove workarounds from `WinUI.targets` #29256
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator improvements - fix #20824
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-refreshview, collectionview-cv2
  • [HybridWebView] Refactor and convert the HybridWebView.js file into a TypeScript file #27183
    area-controls-hybridwebview, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] SpacingItemDecoration improvement #27093
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • How to fix CS9236? #78347
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-10530.88 #78397

Updated

  • IDE0079 triggering false positives on various suppressed diagnostics #75887
    Backlog
  • dotnet_sort_system_directives_first and dotnet_separate_import_directive_groups (IDE0055) don't generate warnings #78391
  • IDE0040 CodeFix with omit_if_default remove `fixed` keyword from field. #78395
  • Remove and Sort usings is not working #77363
  • Parameter hint truncated at call site #77355
  • Optimize temporary string usage when DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler is used #77597
  • Record synthesized implementation of PrintMembers calls object overload for string #78339
    Next
  • Create an 'Indenting String Builder' type to allow users to easily generate C# code that looks good, with almost no overhead. #71162
    Backlog
  • Test plan for "User Defined Compound Assignment Operators" #76934
    .NET 10
  • Comment templates doesn't respect end_of_line = lf in .editorconfig #23143
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure hover markdown for supported platforms uses non-breaking spaces for indentation #78405
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Repack RoslynAnalyzer packages separately from Roslyn packages #78404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations during SourceGeneration #78403
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make compiler detection more resilient #78402
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Extract out an interface for our LSP miscellaneous files workspace #78401
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge "User Defined Compound Assignment Operators" feature to 'main' #78400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Adjust LocalBinderFactory.VisitInvocationExpression to handle attributes on extension parameter #78399
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge branch 'main' into 'UserDefinedCompoundAssignment' #78398
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Additional tests to complete the test plan #78396
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators

Updated

  • A bit of cleanup to StopWatchingReference's code to help diagnose an issue #78394
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Switch to microbuild to publish PR val build symbols #77088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • File based programs IDE support #78208
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add code for analzying copilot changes. #78353
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Precursor work to merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures. #78308
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Dictionary expressions: extend support for key-value pairs to non-dictionary collections of `KeyValuePair<K, V>` #78274
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Move runtime async method validation into initial binding #78310
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Reduce duplicated FileUtilities.GetFileTimeStamp calls #78321
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Private key loaded with X509Certificate2.CreateFromPem is not usable for ECDH on Windows #115232
    10.0.0
  • [Feature Proposal]: Support isolated islands of assemblies for AOT compilation #115231
  • [API Proposal]: Rename arguments for SVE CreateBreak/CreateMask APIs #115225
  • [API Proposal]: Rename arguments for SVE ConditionalExtract APIs #115224
  • Sockets.Unix race between receive completion and cancellation? #115217
    10.0.0
  • Add testing for multiple Native AOT DLLs in the same process #115216
    Future
  • Unhandled exception message is printed multiple times to console #115215

Closed

  • [Feature Proposal]: Support isolated islands of assemblies for AOT compilation #115230
  • ECDsa.Create(ECParameters) behavior is not consistent across platforms with a public/private key mismatch #27830
  • Assertion failed '!"BBJ_EHFINALLYRET predecessor of block that doesn't follow a BBJ_CALLFINALLY!"' #114869
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Debug: Throws 'System.NullReferenceException', Release: Runs successfully #114571
    10.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.PfxTests.ReadMLKem512PrivateKey_NotSupported failing with CryptographicException #115156
    10.0.0
  • Blazor client side web debugging fails to function when run within IIS #101554
    10.0.0
  • Test failures: System.Formats.Nrbf.Tests #114656
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix config source gen with value tuple #115233
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 10.0.0
  • Update DotNetBuild.props #115229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2700033 #115228
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Ensure VN produces correctly initialized simdmask_t #115227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Overwrite cache during recursive map select in VN #115219
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #115214
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: refactor escape analysis to be more bv-centric #115213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support SLH-DSA keys in certs #115212
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Draft] Tar: Refine GNU timestamp handling #115211
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Clean up stale debugger-related surface area in ThreadPool and Task{Scheduler} #115210
    area-System.Threading.Tasks

Merged

  • [cDAC] Implement 'no-op' ISOSDacInterface methods #115207
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid recording uncanonicalizable loops #115223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cDAC] IXCLRDataStackWalk::GetContext returns proper HResult #115157
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: escape analysis for delegates #115172
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Keep side effects in promotion decomposition #115221
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RuntimeAsync] Moving tests from runtimelabs. #115169
    test-enhancement, needs-area-label, runtime-async
  • Add PKCS#8, SPKI and PEM support for SLH-DSA #114943
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    tenet-performance, area-Interop-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Implement IXCLRDataProcess.EnumMethodInstancesByAddress #115131
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Implement ISOSDacImpl.GetAssemblyList #114800
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use packedsimd in hexconverter #115062
    NO-MERGE
  • backport free-list change to release/9.0-staging #115167
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • GC Distribute Free list port from .NET 10 #115023
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [Android] Support static linking of CoreCLR on Android #114629
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • [DRAFT] Write barrier without any RWX pages #114982
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable System.Runtime.Intrinsics/tests in wasm smoke tests #115204
    area-Build-mono
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert JIT_Box* to C# #115134
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Run CoreCLR library tests on Android #114148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: revised fix for fp division issue in profile synthesis #115026
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.6
  • Improve System.Collections.BitArray #115069
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Defer RemoteCertificate assignment after X509 Chain build #114781
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Replace NET6_0 with NET #115209
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add bootstrapping build mechanism and enable for SourceBuild #114285
    source-build, area-Infrastructure
  • [clr-interp] Fix access of boxed static fields address #115198
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Fix empty LdapException.ServerErrorMessage #115192
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Minor tensor fixes #115125
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Implementation for `UnsafeAccessorTypeAttribute` #114881
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Interpreter EH support in the runtime #114649
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Templating workflows broken for paths with special characters on MacOS since SDK 9.0.200 #48794
  • dotnet tool for dotnet framework applications #48791
  • Validating that we need the CI and PR containers #48789

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E][VMR].NET 10 Preview 4 Binaries could not work normally on Alpine Linux. #48513

PullRequests

Created

  • Bring back PublishDotnetWatch #48793
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview4] Do not publish symbol for helloworld binary #48792
  • Enable 'partial' AOT of the CLI #48790
    Area-CLI

Merged

  • Add 9.0.3xx to the branch lockdown labeler #48774
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #48788
    Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48775
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Skip a few tests on osx #45419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Branch Lockdown
  • Implement termination command in the agent and use it to gracefully terminate processes #46003
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, Branch Lockdown
  • tool-update: add --prerelease-skip flag #47174
    untriaged, Area-Tools, Branch Lockdown
  • [release/9.0.3xx] Fixes RepositoryUrl attribute generation #48627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [StaticWebAssets] Optimize compression (#47734) #48636
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, Branch Lockdown
  • [WiX 5] Migrate SDK from v3 to V5 #48699
  • Update multi-file 'dotnet run file' documentation #48437
    documentation, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Local dev props #48739
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Unify the nullable reference type approaches #48776
    Area-CLI
  • Add GitHub Action workflow to update man pages #48784
  • Support RID-specific .NET Tool packages #48575
    untriaged, Area-Tools
